pages.text: $(li)$(l)The Guardian's Guide$() is a new variant of the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/compass)Compass$(/l) that can be used to find specific structures where some powerful creatures live that are normally hard to find in $(l)the Nether$() and in $(l)the End$().
pages.title: The Guardian's Guide

pages.text: $(li)First, just right click while you are holding $(l)The Guardian's Guide$() in your hand.
$(li)Now, select a structure and click the $(l)Start Search$() button to start the Structure Search.
$(li)When the search ends, needle of this compass will indicate the path to the selected Structure.
